remarks: Left-multiplication by a left regular element does not change zeroness. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Mar-2015.)
statement:
rrgval.e $e |- E = ( RLReg ` R ) $.
rrgval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
rrgval.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
rrgval.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
rrgeq0 $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. E /\ Y e. B ) -> ( ( X .x. Y ) = .0. <-> Y = .0. ) ) $.
